alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 07 at 2:15PM PST until November 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. Highest winds are expected across mountains and summits. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 4 AM PST Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
